Help: This file has the keys to individual occupation files for the Time Machine - Jazz Age Edition. Occupations listed in order as they appear on the board.

occupation_square_types.Help: A square where the player can expect to lose points (cash, fame or happiness) or a salary cut.
A square where the player can choose which patch to follow.
A square that awards one or more hearts, stars, Opportunity cards, and/or Experience cards.
A square that awards one or more hearts, stars, Opportunity cards, and/or Experience cards.
